trans-unit.source: Defines a base class for all metadata operations on imaging related [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Definerer en basisklasse for alle operasjoner i metadataene for avbildning relatert [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.
Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
